author: Eknath Easwaran
message: Through meditation and by giving full attention to one thing at a time, we can learn to direct attention where we choose.
title: Thought of the day

author: Helen Keller
message: We could never learn to be brave and patient if there were only joy in the world.
title: Thought of the day

author: Marcus Aurelius
message: If it is not right do not do it; if it is not true do not say it.
title: Thought of the day

author: Norman Schwarzkopf
message: The truth of the matter is that you always know the right thing to do. The hard part is doing it.
title: Thought of the day
